name: Nebula Ball 3D
summary: It's 2250. Aliens and humans pack together in the Nebula Arena for the craziest sport in the galaxy: Bowling! From the dude that’s making Brooke Vs. World Doom comes an absolutely insane bowling game. Each game of bowling is played in a unique level with 10 different lanes, each one trickier than the last. Unlock crazy bowling balls by gaining experience points, which you can earn by scoring high and completing mini objectives that can differ per level.
